example.name: Is this an ethnic slur?
example.text: Japanese tourists will be told [*-1] to take care when [*-2] photographing earthquake damage in San Francisco [*T*-4], the Japan Association of Travel Agents said.

roleset.note: And don't the Japanese have enough earthquake damage at home?
